title: LOL CRASHES  { Charger problem }

replies.body:
This may be caused by your computer switching between dedicated and CPU graphics. I recommend switching your power settings to performance mode with [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq6)

Let me know if this caused any change.
Doesn't work. Problem still occurs. Please give tell more specific solution. {{item:3187}}
Just to confirm, are you using the Garena Client?

Gotcha. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) since the power settings didn't resolve this. If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to your ticket, you'll expedite your service.
